schemas.name: Open PHACTS Dataset Description
schemas.description: Schema corresponding to the Open PHACTS dataset description declaration from 12 September 2013 http://www.openphacts.org/specs/2013/WD-datadesc-20130912/. For the DrugBank demonstration the blank resource should match the <DocumentDescriptionShape>, the #drugbank resource should match the <NonRDFDatasetShape>, the #drugbank-distribution resource should match the <DistributionShape>, and the #drugbank-rdf resource should match the <RDFDatasetShape>. This will result in no errors at the MUST level and 16 warnings.
schemas.data:
PREFIX bdb: <http://vocabularies.bridgedb.org/ops#>
PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dctypes: <http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX freq: <http://purl.org/cld/freq/>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX pav: <http://purl.org/pav/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

PREFIX cheminf: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/>
PREFIX eco: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX edam: <http://edamontology.org/>
PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/>

<DocumentDescriptionShape> {
  `MUST` rdf:type (void:DatasetDescription),
  `MUST` dcterms:issued xsd:dateTime,
  `MUST` foaf:primaryTopic IRI,
  `SHOULD` pav:createdBy IRI*,
  `SHOULD` pav:previousVersion IRI,
  `MAY` (dcterms:title rdf:langString | dcterms:title xsd:string),
  `MAY` (dcterms:description rdf:langString | dcterms:description xsd:string),
  `MAY` pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime,
  `MAY` pav:lastUpdateOn xsd:dateTime,
  `MAY` pav:createdWith IRI
}

<RDFDatasetShape> {
  `MUST` rdf:type (void:Dataset),
  `MUST` (dcterms:title rdf:langString | dcterms:title xsd:string),
  `MUST` (dcterms:description rdf:langString | dcterms:description xsd:string),
  `MUST` dcterms:publisher IRI,
  `MUST` dcat:landingPage IRI,
  `MUST` dcterms:license IRI,
  `MUST` dcterms:issued xsd:dateTime,
  `MUST` void:dataDump IRI,
  `SHOULD` pav:version xsd:string,
  `SHOULD` pav:previousVersion xsd:string,
  `SHOULD` dcterms:accrualPeriodicity IRI, #BUG stem doesn't work freq:~,
  `SHOULD` pav:derivedFrom IRI*,
  `SHOULD` void:subset IRI*,
  `SHOULD` void:exampleResource IRI*,
  `MAY` void:sparqlEndpoint IRI,
  `MAY` (void:uriSpace xsd:string | void:uriRegexPattern xsd:string),
  `MAY` void:vocabulary IRI*,
  `MAY` pav:authoredBy IRI*,
  `MAY` pav:authoredOn xsd:dateTime,
  `MAY` pav:createdBy IRI*,
  `MAY` pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime,
  `MAY` dcat:theme IRI*,
  `MAY` cito:citeAsAuthority IRI*,
  `MAY` foaf:page IRI*
}

<NonRDFDatasetShape> {
  `MUST` rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset),
  `MUST` (dcterms:title rdf:langString | dcterms:title xsd:string),
  `MUST` (dcterms:description rdf:langString | dcterms:description xsd:string),
  `MUST` dcterms:publisher IRI,
  `MUST` dcat:landingPage IRI,
  `MUST` dcterms:license IRI,
  `MUST` dcterms:issued xsd:dateTime,
  `MUST` dcat:distribution IRI*,
  `SHOULD` pav:version xsd:string,
  `SHOULD` pav:previousVersion xsd:string,
  `SHOULD` dcterms:accrualPeriodicity IRI, #BUG stem doesn't work freq:~,
  `SHOULD` pav:derivedFrom IRI*,
  `SHOULD` void:subset IRI*,
  `SHOULD` void:exampleResource IRI*,
  `MAY` void:sparqlEndpoint IRI,
  `MAY` (void:uriSpace xsd:string | void:uriRegexPattern xsd:string),
  `MAY` void:vocabulary IRI*,
  `MAY` pav:authoredBy IRI*,
  `MAY` pav:authoredOn xsd:dateTime,
  `MAY` pav:createdBy IRI*,
  `MAY` pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime,
  `MAY` dcat:theme IRI*,
  `MAY` cito:citeAsAuthority IRI*,
  `MAY` foaf:page IRI*
}

<DistributionShape> {
  `MUST` rdf:type (dcat:Distribution),
  `MUST` dcat:mediaType xsd:string,
  `MUST` dcat:downloadURL IRI,
  `SHOULD` dcterms:issued xsd:dateTime,
  `SHOULD` dcat:byteSize xsd:integer,
  `SHOULD` pav:version xsd:string,
  `SHOULD` pav:previousVersion IRI
}

<LinksetShape> {
  `MUST` rdf:type (void:Linkset),
  `MUST` (dcterms:title rdf:langString | dcterms:title xsd:string),
  `MUST` (dcterms:description rdf:langString | dcterms:description xsd:string),
  `MUST` dcterms:publisher IRI,
  `MUST` dcterms:license IRI,
  `MUST` dcterms:issued xsd:dateTime,
  `MUST` void:dataDump IRI,
  `MUST` (void:subjectsTarget @<RDFDatasetShape> | void:subjectsTarget @<NonRDFDatasetShape> | void:subjectsTarget IRI),
  `MUST` bdb:subjectsDatatype (sio:SIO_001166 sio:SIO_010004 sio:SIO_010299 sio:SIO_010038 sio:SIO_010035 sio:SIO_010432 sio:SIO_010099 sio:SIO_001107 sio:SIO_010043 sio:SIO_010009 sio:SIO_010423),
  `MUST` (void:objectsTarget @<RDFDatasetShape> | void:objectsTarget @<NonRDFDatasetShape> | void:objectsTarget IRI),
  `MUST` bdb:objectsDatatype (sio:SIO_001166 sio:SIO_010004 sio:SIO_010299 sio:SIO_010038 sio:SIO_010035 sio:SIO_010432 sio:SIO_010099 sio:SIO_001107 sio:SIO_010043 sio:SIO_010009 sio:SIO_010423),
  void:linkPredicate IRI,
  bdb:linksetJustification (sio:SIO_010004 cheminf:CHEMINF_000480 cheminf:CHEMINF_000459 cheminf:CHEMINF_000486 cheminf:CHEMINF_000458 obo:has_part cheminf:CHEMINF_000456 cheminf:CHEMINF_000460 cheminf:CHEMINF_000059 obo:is_tautomer_of sio:SIO_001107 edam:data_2342 sio:SIO_000986 sio:SIO_010035 sio:SIO_010099 sio:SIO_010043 sio:SIO_000985 edam:data_1460 sio:SIO_010009 sio:SIO_010423 sio:SIO_001166 sio:SIO_001171),
  bdb:assertionMethod (eco:ECO_0000203 eco:ECO_0000218),
  `SHOULD` void:subset IRI,
  `SHOULD` bdb:subjectsSpecies (obo:NCBITaxon_9913 obo:NCBITaxon_6239 obo:NCBITaxon_9615 obo:NCBITaxon_7955 obo:NCBITaxon_7227 obo:NCBITaxon_9796 obo:NCBITaxon_9031 obo:NCBITaxon_9606 obo:NCBITaxon_10090 obo:NCBITaxon_9598 obo:NCBITaxon_10116 obo:NCBITaxon_4932),
  `SHOULD` bdb:objectsSpecies (obo:NCBITaxon_9913 obo:NCBITaxon_6239 obo:NCBITaxon_9615 obo:NCBITaxon_7955 obo:NCBITaxon_7227 obo:NCBITaxon_9796 obo:NCBITaxon_9031 obo:NCBITaxon_9606 obo:NCBITaxon_10090 obo:NCBITaxon_9598 obo:NCBITaxon_10116 obo:NCBITaxon_4932),
  `MAY` pav:authoredBy IRI,
  `MAY` pav:authoredOn xsd:dateTime,
  `MAY` pav:createdBy IRI,
  `MAY` pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime,
  `MAY` pav:createdWith IRI
}

dataDemos.name: Drugbank Dataset Description
ChEMBL Dataset and Linkset Descriptions

schemas.name: HCLS Community Profile
schemas.description: ShEx schema capturing the HCLS Community Profile published on 14 May 2015
schemas.data:
PREFIX cito: <http://purl.org/spar/cito/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dctypes: <http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX freq: <http://purl.org/cld/freq/>
PREFIX idot: <http://identifiers.org/idot/>
PREFIX lexvo: <http://lexvo.org/id/iso639-3/>
PREFIX pav: <http://purl.org/pav/>
PREFIX prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX schemaorg: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX sd: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sparql-service-description#>
PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/>
PREFIX void: <http://rdfs.org/ns/void#>
PREFIX void-ext: <http://ldf.fi/void-ext#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

<SummaryLevelShape> {


  #Core Metadata

    #Type declaration
    `MUST` rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset),

    #Type declaration
    `MUST NOT` !rdf:type (void:Dataset dcat:Distribution),

    #Title
    `MUST` dct:title rdf:langString,

    #Alternative titles
    `MAY` dct:alternative rdf:langString,

    #Description
    `MUST` dct:description rdf:langString,

    #Date created
    `MUST NOT` !dct:created .,

    #Other dates
    `MUST NOT` !pav:createdOn .,

    #Other dates
    `MUST NOT` !pav:authoredOn .,

    #Other dates
    `MUST NOT` !pav:curatedOn .,

    #Creators
    `MUST NOT` !dct:creator .,

    #Contributors
    `MUST NOT` !dct:contributor .,

    #Contributors
    `MUST NOT` !pav:createdBy .,

    #Contributors
    `MUST NOT` !pav:authoredBy .,

    #Contributors
    `MUST NOT` !pav:curatedBy .,

    #Publisher
    `MUST` dct:publisher IRI,

    #Date of issue
    `MUST NOT` !dct:issued .,

    #HTML page
    `SHOULD` foaf:page IRI,

    #Logo
    `SHOULD` schemaorg:logo IRI,

    #Keywords
    `MAY` dcat:keyword xsd:string+,

    #License
    `MAY` dct:license IRI+,

    #Rights
    `MAY` dct:rights rdf:langString,

    #Language
    `MUST NOT` !dct:language .,

    #References
    `MAY` dct:references IRI+,

    #Concept descriptors
    `MAY` dcat:theme IRI+,

    #Vocabulary used
    `MUST NOT` !void:vocabulary .,

    #Standards used
    `MUST NOT` !dct:conformsTo .,

    #Citations
    `MAY` cito:citesAsAuthority IRI+,

    #Related material
    `MAY` rdfs:seeAlso IRI+,

    #Partitions
    `MAY` dct:hasPart IRI+,


  #Identifiers

    #Preferred prefix
    `MAY` idot:preferredPrefix xsd:string,

    #Alternate prefix
    `MAY` idot:alternatePrefix xsd:string,

    #Identifier pattern
    `MUST NOT` !idot:identifierPattern .,

    #URI pattern
    `MUST NOT` !void:uriRegexPattern .,

    #File access pattern
    `MUST NOT` !idot:accessPattern .,

    #Example identifier
    `MUST NOT` !idot:exampleIdentifier .,

    #Example resource
    `MUST NOT` !void:exampleResource .,


  #Provenance and Change

    #Version identifier
    `MUST NOT` !pav:version .,

    #Version linking
    `MUST NOT` !dct:isVersionOf .,

    #Version linking
    `MUST NOT` !pav:previousVersion .,

    #Version linking
    `MAY` pav:hasCurrentVersion IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `MUST NOT` !dct:source .,

    #Data source provenance
    `MUST NOT` !pav:retrievedFrom .,

    #Data source provenance
    `MUST NOT` !prov:wasDerivedFrom .,

    #Item listing
    `MUST NOT` !sio:has-data-item .,

    #Creation tool
    `MUST NOT` !pav:createdWith .,

    #Update frequency
    `SHOULD` dct:accrualPeriodicity IRI,


  #Availability/Distributions

    #Distribution description
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:distribution .,

    #File format
    `MUST NOT` !dct:format .,

    #File directory
    `MAY` dcat:accessURL IRI,

    #File URL
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:downloadURL .,

    #Byte size
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:byteSize .,

    #RDF File URL
    `MUST NOT` !void:dataDump .,

    #SPARQL endpoint
    `SHOULD` void:sparqlEndpoint IRI,

    #Documentation
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:landingPage .,

    #Linkset
    `MUST NOT` !void:subset .,


  #Statistics

    ## of triples
    `MUST NOT` !void:triples .,

    ## of typed entities
    `MUST NOT` !void:entities .,

    ## of subjects
    `MUST NOT` !void:distinctSubjects .,

    ## of properties
    `MUST NOT` !void:properties .,

    ## of objects
    `MUST NOT` !void:distinctObjects .,

    ## of classes
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition .,

    ## of literals
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition .,

    ## of RDF graphs
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition .,

    #class frequency
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition .,

    #property frequency
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .,

    #property and subject types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .,

    #property and object types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .,

    #property and literals
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .,

    #property subject and object types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .
}

<VersionLevelShape> {


  #Core Metadata

    #Type declaration
    `MUST` rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset),

    #Type declaration
    `MUST NOT` !rdf:type (void:Dataset dcat:Distribution),

    #Title
    `MUST` dct:title rdf:langString,

    #Alternative titles
    `MAY` dct:alternative rdf:langString,

    #Description
    `MUST` dct:description rdf:langString,

    #Date created
    `SHOULD` (dct:created  xsd:date | dct:created  xsd:dateTime | dct:created xsd:gYearMonth | dct:created xsd:gYear | dct:created xsd:dateTime),

    #Other dates
    `MAY` (pav:createdOn xsd:date | pav:createdOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:createdOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:createdOn xsd:gYear | pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime),

    #Other dates
    `MAY` (pav:authoredOn xsd:date | pav:authoredOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:authoredOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:authoredOn xsd:gYear | pav:authoredOn xsd:dateTime)+,

    #Other dates
    `MAY` (pav:curatedOn xsd:date | pav:curatedOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:curatedOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:curatedOn xsd:gYear | pav:curatedOn xsd:dateTime)+,

    #Creators
    `MUST` dct:creator IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` dct:contributor IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:createdBy IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:authoredBy IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:curatedBy IRI+,

    #Publisher
    `MUST` dct:publisher IRI+,

    #Date of issue
    `SHOULD` (dct:issued xsd:date | dct:issued  xsd:dateTime | dct:issued xsd:gYearMonth | dct:issued xsd:gYear | dct:issued xsd:dateTime),

    #HTML page
    `SHOULD` foaf:page IRI,

    #Logo
    `SHOULD` schemaorg:logo IRI,

    #Keywords
    `MAY` dcat:keyword xsd:string+,

    #License
    `SHOULD` dct:license IRI+,

    #Rights
    `MAY` dct:rights rdf:langString,

    #Language
    `SHOULD` dct:language IRI+,

    #References
    `MAY` dct:references IRI+,

    #Concept descriptors
    `MAY` dcat:theme IRI+,

    #Vocabulary used
    `MUST NOT` !void:vocabulary .,

    #Standards used
    `MAY` dct:conformsTo IRI+,

    #Citations
    `MAY` cito:citesAsAuthority IRI+,

    #Related material
    `MAY` rdfs:seeAlso IRI+,

    #Partitions
    `MAY` dct:hasPart IRI+,


  #Identifiers

    #Preferred prefix
    `MAY` idot:preferredPrefix xsd:string,

    #Alternate prefix
    `MAY` idot:alternatePrefix xsd:string+,

    #Identifier pattern
    `MUST NOT` !idot:identifierPattern .,

    #URI pattern
    `MUST NOT` !void:uriRegexPattern .,

    #File access pattern
    `MUST NOT` !idot:accessPattern .,

    #Example identifier
    `MUST NOT` !idot:exampleIdentifier .,

    #Example resource
    `MUST NOT` !void:exampleResource .,


  #Provenance and Change

    #Version identifier
    `MUST` pav:version xsd:string,

    #Version linking
    `MUST` dct:isVersionOf IRI,

    #Version linking
    `SHOULD` pav:previousVersion IRI,

    #Version linking
    `MUST NOT` !pav:hasCurrentVersion .,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` dct:source IRI+,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` pav:retrievedFrom IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` prov:wasDerivedFrom IRI+,

    #Item listing
    `MUST NOT` !sio:has-data-item .,

    #Creation tool
    `SHOULD` pav:createdWith IRI,

    #Update frequency
    `MUST NOT` !dct:accrualPeriodicity .,


  #Availability/Distributions

    #Distribution description
    `SHOULD` dcat:distribution IRI+,

    #File format
    `MUST NOT` !dct:format .,

    #File directory
    `MAY` dcat:accessURL IRI,

    #File URL
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:downloadURL .,

    #Byte size
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:byteSize .,

    #RDF File URL
    `MUST NOT` !void:dataDump .,

    #SPARQL endpoint
    `SHOULD NOT` !void:sparqlEndpoint .,

    #Documentation
    `MAY` dcat:landingPage IRI,

    #Linkset
    `MUST NOT` !void:subset .,


  #Statistics

    ## of triples
    `MUST NOT` !void:triples .,

    ## of typed entities
    `MUST NOT` !void:entities .,

    ## of subjects
    `MUST NOT` !void:distinctSubjects .,

    ## of properties
    `MUST NOT` !void:properties .,

    ## of objects
    `MUST NOT` !void:distinctObjects .,

    ## of classes
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition .,

    ## of literals
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition .,

    ## of RDF graphs
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition .,

    #class frequency
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition .,

    #property frequency
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .,

    #property and subject types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .,

    #property and object types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .,

    #property and literals
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .,

    #property subject and object types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .
}

###This shape is not for matching RDF Distributions
<DistributionLevelShape> {

  #Core Metadata

    #Type declaration
    `SHOULD` rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset),

    #Type declaration
    `MUST NOT` !rdf:type (void:Dataset),
    `MUST` rdf:type (dcat:Distribution),

    #Title
    `MUST` dct:title rdf:langString,

    #Alternative titles
    `MAY` dct:alternative rdf:langString,

    #Description
    `MUST` dct:description rdf:langString,

    #Date created
    `SHOULD` (dct:created  xsd:date | dct:created  xsd:dateTime | dct:created xsd:gYearMonth | dct:created xsd:gYear | dct:created xsd:dateTime),

    #Other dates
    `MAY` (pav:createdOn xsd:date | pav:createdOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:createdOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:createdOn xsd:gYear | pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime),

    #Other dates
    `MAY` (pav:authoredOn xsd:date | pav:authoredOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:authoredOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:authoredOn xsd:gYear | pav:authoredOn xsd:dateTime)+,

    #Other dates
    `MAY` (pav:curatedOn xsd:date | pav:curatedOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:curatedOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:curatedOn xsd:gYear | pav:curatedOn xsd:dateTime)+,

    #Creators
    `MUST` dct:creator IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` dct:contributor IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:createdBy IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:authoredBy IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:curatedBy IRI+,

    #Publisher
    `MUST` dct:publisher IRI,

    #Date of issue
    `SHOULD` (dct:issued xsd:date | dct:issued  xsd:dateTime | dct:issued xsd:gYearMonth | dct:issued xsd:gYear | dct:issued xsd:dateTime),

    #HTML page
    `SHOULD` foaf:page IRI,

    #Logo
    `SHOULD` schemaorg:logo IRI,

    #Keywords
    `MAY` dcat:keyword xsd:string+,

    #License
    `MUST` dct:license IRI+,

    #Rights
    `MAY` dct:rights rdf:langString,

    #Language
    `SHOULD` dct:language IRI+,

    #References
    `MAY` dct:references IRI+,

    #Concept descriptors
    `MAY` dcat:theme IRI+,

    #Vocabulary used
    `MUST NOT` !void:vocabulary .,

    #Standards used
    `SHOULD` dct:conformsTo IRI+,

    #Citations
    `MAY` cito:citesAsAuthority IRI+,

    #Related material
    `MAY` rdfs:seeAlso IRI+,

    #Partitions
    `MUST NOT` !dct:hasPart .,


  #Identifiers

    #Preferred prefix
    `MAY` idot:preferredPrefix xsd:string,

    #Alternate prefix
    `MAY` idot:alternatePrefix xsd:string+,

    #Identifier pattern
    `MAY` idot:identifierPattern xsd:string,

    #URI pattern
    `MUST NOT` !void:uriRegexPattern .,

    #File access pattern
    `MAY` idot:accessPattern .+,

    #Example identifier
    `SHOULD` idot:exampleIdentifier xsd:string+,

    #Example resource
    `MUST NOT` !void:exampleResource .,


  #Provenance and Change

    #Version identifier
    `SHOULD` pav:version xsd:string,

    #Version linking
    `MUST NOT` !dct:isVersionOf .,

    #Version linking
    `SHOULD` pav:previousVersion IRI,

    #Version linking
    `MUST NOT` !pav:hasCurrentVersion .,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` dct:source IRI+,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` pav:retrievedFrom IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` prov:wasDerivedFrom IRI+,

    #Item listing
    `MAY` sio:has-data-item IRI+,

    #Creation tool
    `SHOULD` pav:createdWith IRI,

    #Update frequency
    `MUST NOT` !dct:accrualPeriodicity .,


  #Availability/Distributions

    #Distribution description
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:distribution .,

    #File format
    `MUST` dct:format .+,

    #File directory
    `MAY` dcat:accessURL IRI+,

    #File URL
    `SHOULD` dcat:downloadURL IRI+,

    #Byte size
    `SHOULD` dcat:byteSize xsd:decimal+,

    #RDF File URL
    `MUST NOT` !void:dataDump .,

    #SPARQL endpoint
    `MUST NOT` !void:sparqlEndpoint IRI,

    #Documentation
    `MAY` dcat:landingPage IRI,

    #Linkset
    `MUST NOT` !void:subset .,


  #Statistics

    ## of triples
    `MUST NOT` !void:triples .,

    ## of typed entities
    `MUST NOT` !void:entities .,

    ## of subjects
    `MUST NOT` !void:distinctSubjects .,

    ## of properties
    `MUST NOT` !void:properties .,

    ## of objects
    `MUST NOT` !void:distinctObjects .,

    ## of classes
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition .,

    ## of literals
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition .,

    ## of RDF graphs
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition .,

    #class frequency
    `MUST NOT` !void:classPartition .,

    #property frequency
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .,

    #property and subject types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .,

    #property and object types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .,

    #property and literals
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .,

    #property subject and object types
    `MUST NOT` !void:propertyPartition .
}

<RDFDistributionLevelShape> {

  #Core Metadata

    #Type declaration
    `SHOULD` rdf:type (dctypes:Dataset),

    #Type declaration
    `MUST` rdf:type (void:Dataset),
    `MUST` rdf:type (dcat:Distribution),

    #Title
    `MUST` dct:title rdf:langString,

    #Alternative titles
    `MAY` dct:alternative rdf:langString,

    #Description
    `MUST` dct:description rdf:langString,

    #Date created
    `SHOULD` (dct:created  xsd:date | dct:created  xsd:dateTime | dct:created xsd:gYearMonth | dct:created xsd:gYear | dct:created xsd:dateTime),

    #Other dates
    `MAY` (pav:createdOn xsd:date | pav:createdOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:createdOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:createdOn xsd:gYear | pav:createdOn xsd:dateTime),

    #Other dates
    `MAY` (pav:authoredOn xsd:date | pav:authoredOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:authoredOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:authoredOn xsd:gYear | pav:authoredOn xsd:dateTime)+,

    #Other dates
    `MAY` (pav:curatedOn xsd:date | pav:curatedOn  xsd:dateTime | pav:curatedOn xsd:gYearMonth | pav:curatedOn xsd:gYear | pav:curatedOn xsd:dateTime)+,

    #Creators
    `MUST` dct:creator IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` dct:contributor IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:createdBy IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:authoredBy IRI+,

    #Contributors
    `MAY` pav:curatedBy IRI+,

    #Publisher
    `MUST` dct:publisher IRI,

    #Date of issue
    `SHOULD` (dct:issued xsd:date | dct:issued  xsd:dateTime | dct:issued xsd:gYearMonth | dct:issued xsd:gYear | dct:issued xsd:dateTime),

    #HTML page
    `SHOULD` foaf:page IRI,

    #Logo
    `SHOULD` schemaorg:logo IRI,

    #Keywords
    `MAY` dcat:keyword xsd:string+,

    #License
    `MUST` dct:license IRI+,

    #Rights
    `MAY` dct:rights rdf:langString,

    #Language
    `SHOULD` dct:language IRI+,

    #References
    `MAY` dct:references IRI+,

    #Concept descriptors
    `MAY` dcat:theme IRI+,

    #Vocabulary used
    `SHOULD` void:vocabulary IRI*,

    #Standards used
    `SHOULD` dct:conformsTo IRI+,

    #Citations
    `MAY` cito:citesAsAuthority IRI+,

    #Related material
    `MAY` rdfs:seeAlso IRI+,

    #Partitions
    `MUST NOT` !dct:hasPart .,


  #Identifiers

    #Preferred prefix
    `MAY` idot:preferredPrefix xsd:string,

    #Alternate prefix
    `MAY` idot:alternatePrefix xsd:string+,

    #Identifier pattern
    `MAY` idot:identifierPattern xsd:string,

    #URI pattern
    `MAY` void:uriRegexPattern xsd:string,

    #File access pattern
    `MAY` idot:accessPattern .+,

    #Example identifier
    `SHOULD` idot:exampleIdentifier xsd:string+,

    #Example resource
    `SHOULD` void:exampleResource IRI+,


  #Provenance and Change

    #Version identifier
    `SHOULD` pav:version xsd:string,

    #Version linking
    `MUST NOT` !dct:isVersionOf .,

    #Version linking
    `SHOULD` pav:previousVersion IRI,

    #Version linking
    `MUST NOT` !pav:hasCurrentVersion .,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` dct:source IRI+,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` pav:retrievedFrom IRI,

    #Data source provenance
    `SHOULD` prov:wasDerivedFrom IRI+,

    #Item listing
    `MAY` sio:has-data-item IRI+,

    #Creation tool
    `SHOULD` pav:createdWith IRI,

    #Update frequency
    `MUST NOT` !dct:accrualPeriodicity .,


  #Availability/Distributions

    #Distribution description
    `MUST NOT` !dcat:distribution .,

    #File format
    `MUST` dct:format .+,

    #File directory
    `MAY` dcat:accessURL IRI+,

    #File URL
    `SHOULD` dcat:downloadURL IRI+,

    #Byte size
    `SHOULD` dcat:byteSize xsd:decimal+,

    #RDF File URL
    `SHOULD` void:dataDump IRI+,

    #SPARQL endpoint
    `SHOULD NOT` !void:sparqlEndpoint IRI,

    #Documentation
    `MAY` dcat:landingPage IRI,

    #Linkset
    `SHOULD` void:subset IRI+,


  #Statistics

    ## of triples
    `SHOULD` void:triples xsd:integer,

    ## of typed entities
    `SHOULD` void:entities xsd:integer,

    ## of subjects
    `SHOULD` void:distinctSubjects xsd:integer,

    ## of properties
    `SHOULD` void:properties xsd:integer,

    ## of objects
    `SHOULD` void:distinctObjects xsd:integer,

    ## of classes
    `SHOULD` void:classPartition IRI+,

    ## of literals
    `SHOULD` void:classPartition IRI+,

    ## of RDF graphs
    `SHOULD` void:classPartition IRI+,

    #class frequency
    `MAY` void:classPartition IRI+,

    #property frequency
    `MAY` void:propertyPartition IRI+,

    #property and subject types
    `MAY` void:propertyPartition IRI+,

    #property and object types
    `MAY` void:propertyPartition IRI+,

    #property and literals
    `MAY` void:propertyPartition IRI+,

    #property subject and object types
    `MAY` void:propertyPartition IRI+
}

dataDemos.name: ChEMBL 2015 Demo

schemas.name: DCAT
schemas.description: W3C Data Catalog Vocabulary http://www.w3.org/TR/2014/REC-vocab-dcat-20140116/  DCAT is an RDF vocabulary designed to facilitate interoperability between data catalogs published on the Web. This document defines the schema and provides examples for its use.  By using DCAT to describe datasets in data catalogs, publishers increase discoverability and enable applications easily to consume metadata from multiple catalogs. It further enables decentralized publishing of catalogs and facilitates federated dataset search across sites. Aggregated DCAT metadata can serve as a manifest file to facilitate digital preservation. Note that the example will generate a single error due to the use of the rdfs:label property. Validating without the closed world assumption will enable this to pass.
schemas.data:
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dctype: <http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/>
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX vcard: <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

<Catalog> {
  rdf:type (dcat:Catalog),
  dct:title xsd:string?,
  dct:description xsd:string?,
  (dct:issued xsd:date | dct:issued  xsd:dateTime | dct:issued xsd:gYearMonth | dct:issued xsd:gYear | dct:issued xsd:dateTime)?,
  (dct:modified  xsd:date | dct:modified  xsd:dateTime | dct:modified xsd:gYearMonth | dct:modified xsd:gYear | dct:modified xsd:dateTime)?,
  dct:language .*,
  dct:publisher IRI?,
  dct:themes IRI*,
  dct:license .?,
  dct:rights .?,
  dct:spatial .?,
  dcat:dataset IRI*,
  dcat:record .?,
  foaf:homepage IRI?
}

<Agent> {
  rdf:type (foaf:Agent foaf:Organization foaf:Person foaf:Group),
  foaf:name xsd:string*
}

<Dataset> {
  rdf:type (dcat:Dataset),
  dct:title xsd:string?,
  dct:description xsd:string?,
  (dct:issued xsd:date | dct:issued  xsd:dateTime | dct:issued xsd:gYearMonth | dct:issued xsd:gYear | dct:issued xsd:dateTime)?,
  (dct:modified  xsd:date | dct:modified  xsd:dateTime | dct:modified xsd:gYearMonth | dct:modified xsd:gYear | dct:modified xsd:dateTime)?,
  dct:language .*,
  dct:publisher IRI?,
  dct:accrualPeriodicity .?,
  dct:identifier .?,
  dct:temporal .?,
  dcat:theme IRI*,
  dct:relation IRI*,
  dcat:keyword xsd:string*,
  dcat:contactPoint .*,
  dct:temporal .?,
  dct:spatial .?,
  dcat:distribution IRI*,
  dcat:landingPage IRI*
}

<Distribution> {
  rdf:type (dcat:Distribution),
  dct:title xsd:string?,
  dct:description xsd:string?,
  (dct:issued xsd:date | dct:issued  xsd:dateTime | dct:issued xsd:gYearMonth | dct:issued xsd:gYear | dct:issued xsd:dateTime)?,
  (dct:modified  xsd:date | dct:modified  xsd:dateTime | dct:modified xsd:gYearMonth | dct:modified xsd:gYear | dct:modified xsd:dateTime)?,
  dct:language .*,
  dct:license .?,
  dct:rights .?,
  dcat:accessURL IRI?,
  dcat:downloadURL IRI?,
  dcat:mediaType .?,
  dct:format .?,
  dcat:byteSize xsd:decimal?
}

<CatalogRecord> {
  rdf:type (dcat:CatalogRecord),
  dct:title xsd:string?,
  dct:description xsd:string?,
  (dct:issued xsd:date | dct:issued  xsd:dateTime | dct:issued xsd:gYearMonth | dct:issued xsd:gYear | dct:issued xsd:dateTime)?,
  (dct:modified  xsd:date | dct:modified  xsd:dateTime | dct:modified xsd:gYearMonth | dct:modified xsd:gYear | dct:modified xsd:dateTime)?,
  foaf:primaryTopic IRI
}
